      • Carnivore

        public Carnivore(int generation,
                 java.awt.Point pos,
                 double angle,
                 int speed,
                 int detectRadius,
                 int eggCycle,
                 int carnivorePoints,
                 double energy,
                 double metabolism,
                 long chaseLength)
        Carnivore constructor
        Parameters:
        generation - generation of carnivore
        pos - Point position
        angle - Double angle
        speed - Int speed
        detectRadius - radius of detection for herbivores
        eggCycle - time till hatching of eggs laid
        carnivorePoints - how quantifiably carnivore the carnivore is
        energy - Double energy of carnivore
        metabolism - Double speed of energy use, metabolism
        chaseLength - Time until carnivore gives up chase of a herbivore
